Hymn.Arabic: " يارب بقوتك يفرح الملك، وبخلاصك يتهلل جدًا،
Hymn.English: 21:1 The king shall have joy in Your strength, O Lord; And in Your salvation how greatly shall he rejoice!

Hymn.Arabic: شهوة قلبه أعطيته، وسؤال شفتيه لم تمنعه. هلليلويا "
Hymn.English: 2 You have given him his heart's desire, And have not withheld the request of his lips.
